template.name: Template OS Linux Prom
template.description: Official Linux template using node exporter. version: 0.15

step.params: //count the number of cores return JSON.parse(value).length

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU idle time
item_prototype.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU system time
item_prototype.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU user time
item_prototype.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU steal time
item_prototype.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU softirq time
item_prototype.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU nice time
item_prototype.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that have been niced.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU iowait time
item_prototype.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU interrupt time
item_prototype.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU guest time
item_prototype.description: Guest time (time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system)

item_prototype.name: #{#CPUNUM}: CPU guest nice time
item_prototype.description: Time spent running a niced guest (virtual CPU for guest operating systems under the control of the Linux kernel)
